response.overview: Twelve is the modern day sci-fi odyssey of Zach, a club kid who wakes up on a friend's floor with amnesia. Zach has no recollection of himself, his past, his friends, enemies, family or even his name - thus beginning a bewildering and harrowing search for his life. Figuring his condition is the result of partying too hard the night before, he slips back into his daily routine in hopes that his mind will return to him. But plagued with a disturbing sense of unfamiliarity, he begins to investigate himself, and discovers that the life he's been told is his, is not. Now, he must uncover the life he's been living secretly from his friends - a life that is secret now even to him.
response.title: Twelve
